name: My way, my life
description:
Theme : Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

I choose : Anticipation and Random.   

Control :

  Left click : Create link/your way or place a special zone. 

Right click: Turn a special zone. 

X : Prepare a Slow Zone (it's a special zone). 

C : Prepare a Speed Zone (it's a special zone).

 V : Prepare a Safe Zone (it's a special zone). 

Space bar : Start the walk. 

Escape : Stop the game.  

The Goal : Reach the green area with your avatar. You need to create your own way to success this but be careful, your enemies are imprevisible.  

If you can, take the money on the floor.  

Don't forget : Your final link need to be in the final area ( the green one).  

An other things, you can create the speciales zones only before you press the space bar or after you died.

 I put this game in Jam but it's a Compo game. Every things in this game was create by me but I didn't understand the rules for the Compo ^^" so it's on the Jam part.  Enjoy if you can

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/my-way-my-life
